title: Kassadin Build
body:
What are your thoughts on these builds?
1.Boots, RoA, Lich Bane, Hourglass, Deathcap, Void Staff

2.Boots, RoA, Seraph's, Lich Bane, Deathcap, Void Staff

3.Boots, RoA, Seraph's, Lich Bane, Hourglass, Deathcap

replies.body: pros dont build lich bane on kassadin so i hate those builds. c:
